name: stux
subtitle: Created with love in the Netherlands!
description:
Welcome to my AltStore repository where I publish all my current and future games for free. 

 I am stux, a web- and game developer from the Netherlands who loves to create and give away. My personal philosophy is to give away everything for free and give people who love my work the option to donate. 

If you like you can donate via the following ways: 

 - PayPal.me/stuxOS 
 - Patreon.com/mstdn 
 - Ko-Fi.com/mstdn 
 - stux.me/donate

apps.name: Flap That Cat
apps.subtitle: Almost like the good ol days!
apps.localizedDescription:
Flap That Cat: The Purr-fect Adventure! 

Get ready for a whimsical journey with Flap That Cat! Join our adorable feline hero on an adventure through a world filled with colorful pipes and endless challenges. Tap to flap and guide your kitty as it soars through the air, dodging obstacles and striving for the highest score 

 Features:
- Simple Controls
- Endless Fun
- Collect Points
- Charming Graphics

 Challenge Your Friends: Compete with friends and players around the globe. Who can achieve the highest score and claim the title of Flap That Cat champion?
Download Flap That Cat today and embark on an adventure that will keep you flapping for hours! Perfect for players of all ages, this game will have you coming back for more fun and challenges. Are you ready to take flight?


- No ads
- No in-app purchases
- No data collection
- Free forever

apps.name: Tab That Cat
apps.subtitle: How fast can you meow?
apps.localizedDescription:
A silly cat tapping game where you collect as much meows as possible by tapping Washington the cat on your screen. 
 Open the Catnip in-game store to spend your collected Meows to increase Meows gain, protect from Meows being stolen by George or level up! All items have different effect on meows gain. When you level up you can choose a multiplayer for your next level and so on! 

- Tap for meows 
- Increase speed & level 
- Protect from George the cat stealing
- Meow, meow!

 Increase meows by buying items for Washington, level up and protect your meows from being stolen by George the cat! 

- NO in-app purchases 
- NO advertisements 
- Free on Alt Store!

apps.name: Pocket FPS â€” Zombies
apps.subtitle: Clear waves of zombies!
apps.localizedDescription:
Pocket FPS Zombies is a simple first person shooter where you kills lots of zombies in waves on 6 different game maps! Choose from 2 weapons and 6 different maps to play on. 

- 2 types of rifles 
- 6 different game maps 
- Middle East 
- The Docks 
- Warzone Town 
- Warzone 
- Warehouse 
- Army Base 

Get XP to level up for killing zombies and completing levels! Zombies spawn with random stats making each battle harder or easier. In the future higher level will be rewarded with better weapons. 

- NO in-app purchases 
- NO advertisements 
- Free on AltStore!

apps.name: Pocket Runner
apps.subtitle: Can you outrun your friends?
apps.localizedDescription:
Get ready for nonstop action in Pocket Runner! Dash through vibrant landscapes in this endless runner, collecting coins and unlocking fun new characters. 

- Endless Fun: Run as far as you can while avoiding obstacles! 
- Coin Collection: Gather coins to unlock unique characters with special abilities. 
- Simple Controls: Easy-to-learn gameplay for all ages! 
- High Score Challenge: Compete against friends and climb the leaderboards! 

Download Pocket Runner now and see how far you can go! Adventure awaits!

apps.name: A Cat's Tale
apps.subtitle: Meow, meow! Jump into your own cat life adventure with a ton of new quests!
apps.localizedDescription:
Meow, meow! Jump into your own cat life adventure with a ton of new quests! 

Meow! Ready for a fun cat adventure? Join George and Washy, two playful cats, as they explore a cute town full of friendly animals and exciting quests! 

Roam the streets, meet fun villagers, and help them with all sorts of tasks. Knock over items, clean up trash, and cause a little mischief to level up! 

- Play as George or Washy 
- 20+ quests 
- Level up! 
- More features in future updates! 

Are you ready to pounce into a world of fun and adventure? 

Download now and start your very own cat-tastic journey! 

Need help? Checkout the forums on CatsTale.io

apps.name: Washy's Adventure
apps.subtitle: Save the world and rescue cats!
apps.localizedDescription:
Save the world and rescue cats! 

Get ready for a pawsome journey with Washy the Cat, the bravest kitty around! 
Dive into a colorful 2D pixel world full of fun, excitement, and challenges. Can you help Washy rescue 50 missing cats, defeat enemies, and unlock all 9 exciting levels? 

- Action-packed levels â€“ Explore 9 unique stages with cool surprises! 
- Defeat enemies â€“ Jump, dodge, and slide your way to victory! 
- Save 50 cats â€“ Every rescued kitty brings you closer to being a hero! 
- Achievements & Highscores â€“ Show off your skills and challenge your friends! 

Adventure awaits! Join Washy the Cat today and embark on the ultimate rescue mission! Download now and start your purr-fect adventure! 

Save the kitties!
